plugin.name: PlanesWalker
plugin.author: Naricain
plugin.purpose: Track down mobs in upper and lower planes when targeted by Search & Destroy

muclient.script:
local json = require 'json' require 'gmcphelper'
local PLUGINS = { GMCP_HANDLER = "3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264", SND = "30000000537461726c696e67", }
-- Pool room is 29364 + pool num (starting at 1) local POOL_START_ROOM = 29364 local MAX_POOL = 14
local MOB_LOCATIONS = { ["a paladin einheriar"] = 1, ["a psionic einheriar"] = 1, ["a cleric einheriar"] = 1, ["a ranger einheriar"] = 1, ["a warrior einheriar"] = 1, ["a thief einheriar"] = 1, ["a mage einheriar"] = 1, ["a titan"] = 1, ["a per"] = 1, ["a bariaur"] = 1, ["a malelephant"] = 2, ["a nightmare"] = 2, ["a larva"] = 2, ["a hordling"] = 3, ["a yagnoloth"] = 3, ["a night hag"] = 3, ["an ultroloth"] = {4, 5}, ["an arcanaloth"] = 4, ["a dergholoth"] = {4, 5}, ["a hydroloth"] = {4, 5}, ["a mezzoloth"] = {4, 5}, ["a psicloth"] = {4, 5}, ["a nycaloth"] = {4, 5}, ["a vaporighu"] = 4, ["general of gehenna"] = 4, ["an adamantite dragon"] = 6, ["an air sentinel"] = 6, ["a monadic deva"] = 6, ["an agathinon aasimon"] = 7, ["an astral deva"] = 7, ["a translator"] = 7, ["a t'uen-rin"] = 7, ["a tuen-rin"] = 7, ["a lantern archon"] = 8, ["a tome archon"] = 8, ["a noctral"] = 8, ["a planetar aasimon"] = 8, ["a warden archon"] = 8, ["a hound archon"] = 8, ["a sword archon"] = 8, ["a zoveri"] = 8, ["a light aasimon"] = 10, ["a solar aasimon"] = 10, ["a movanic deva"] = 10, ["a balanea"] = 10, ["a phoenix"] = 10, ["a moon dog"] = 10, ["a mortai"] = 11, ["an animal spirit"] = 11, ["an animal lord"] = 11, ["a warden beast"] = 11, }
function toboolean(val) if not val or val == "false" then return false else return true end end
local debug_mode = toboolean(GetVariable("debug_mode") or false) local entry_command = GetVariable("entry_command")
local current_target local last_pools
local search_start_time local DELAYED_SEARCH_TIMEOUT = 5 -- 5 seconds
function OnPluginInstall() ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", string.rep("=", 80)) Tell(string.rep(" ", 29)) ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "PlanesWalker ", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", "installed") print("") Tell(string.rep(" ", 25)) ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", "Type ", LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "pw help ", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", "for instructions")
if not check_snd() then ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", "This plugin requires Crowley's Search and Destroy v5.81 or greater for full use.") end
ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", string.rep("=", 80)) print("") end
function check_snd() -- Check SnD is enabled and version >= 5.81 return GetPluginInfo(PLUGINS.SND, 17) and GetPluginInfo(PLUGINS.SND, 19) >= 5.81 end
function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) if id == PLUGINS.SND then if text == 'target_changed' then target_changed() elseif text == "target_cleared" then clear_target() end end end
function target_in_planes(target) if not target then return false else return target.area == 'uplanes' or target.area == "lplanes" end end
function target_changed() local ret, target_json = CallPlugin(PLUGINS.SND, "target_as_json") if ret > 0 then DebugNote("SnD target_as_json returned error code ", ret) clear_target() return end
local target = json.decode(target_json)
if target_in_planes(target) then current_target = { name = target.name, exact = true } search_start_time = os.clock() else clear_target() end end
function clear_target() DebugNote("Target cleared") if current_target then DebugNote("Last target was in planes. Clearing pools options.") last_pools = nil end current_target = nil end
function enter_pool_alias(name, line, wildcards) enter_pool(tonumber(wildcards.pool_num)) end
function choose_pool_option(name, line, wildcards) local option = tonumber(wildcards.opt)
if not last_pools or not last_pools[option] then InfoNote("No pool ", option, " found. Try running ", "am <mob name>", " to search for a mob in upper and lower planes.") return end
enter_pool(last_pools[option].pool) end
function enter_pool(pool_num) if pool_num < 1 or pool_num > MAX_POOL then InfoNote("Pool must be between ", 1, " and ", MAX_POOL) return end Execute(string.format("mapper goto %i", POOL_START_ROOM + pool_num)) Execute("enter pool") if entry_command then Execute(entry_command) end end
function show_target_list() if current_target then execute_mob_search(current_target) else InfoNote("No target selected. Search for a target with ", "pw <mob name>", " or select a target from Search and Destroy and try again.") end end
function mob_search(name, line, wildcards) current_target = { name = wildcards.name:lower(), exact = false, } execute_mob_search(current_target) end
function do_target_search() if current_target then execute_mob_search(current_target) end end
function execute_search_in_planes() if not search_start_time then return elseif not current_target then search_start_time = nil return elseif os.clock() >= search_start_time + DELAYED_SEARCH_TIMEOUT then DebugNote("Took too long to get to planes, showing search now") search_start_time = nil execute_mob_search(current_target) return end
local room = gmcp("room.info")
if in_planes(room) then execute_mob_search(current_target) search_start_time = nil end end
function in_planes(room) if room.zone == "uplanes" or room.zone == "lplanes" then return true elseif room.zone == "amusement" then local room_id = tonumber(room.num) return room_id and room_id >= POOL_START_ROOM and room_id <= POOL_START_ROOM + 14 else return false end end
function execute_mob_search(target) local matches = {} local search_name = target.name:lower()
for name, pool in pairs(MOB_LOCATIONS) do if (target.exact and search_name == name) or (not target.exact and name:find(search_name)) then if type(pool) == "table" then for i, p in ipairs(pool) do table.insert(matches, { name = name, pool = p }) end else table.insert(matches, { name = name, pool = pool }) end end end
if #matches == 0 then InfoNote("No matches found in any planes map found for ", target.name) last_pools = nil return end
local match_sorter = function(a, b) if a.pool < b.pool then return true elseif a.pool > b.pool then return false else return a.name < b.name end end
table.sort(matches, match_sorter) last_pools = matches
print("") ColourNote("#808080", "", string.format("%3s %-25s %-4s", "Num", "Mob", "Pool")) ColourNote("#808080", "", string.rep("-", 36)) local background, command, tooltip
for i, match in ipairs(matches) do background = (i % 2) == 0 and "#000040" or "" command = string.format("pw %i", i) tooltip = string.format("Enter pool %i", match.pool)
Hyperlink(command, string.format("%3i ", i), tooltip, LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, background, false, true) Hyperlink(command, string.format("%-25s ", upcase_first_char(match.name)), tooltip, LOG_COLORS.INFO, background, false, true) Hyperlink(command, string.format("%-4i", match.pool), tooltip, LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, background, false, true) print("") end ColourNote("#808080", "", string.rep("-", 36)) log_with_alternating_note({"Use ", "pw <num>", " to enter the pool for that mob."}, LOG_COLORS.INFO, LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT) end
function check_entry_command() if entry_command then InfoNote("Your current entry command is ", entry_command, ". This will be executed every time you use PlanesWalker to enter a uplane/lplanes pool. You can change it with ", "pw entry <command>", " or clear it with ", "pw entry clear", ".") else InfoNote("No entry command set. Use ", "pw entry <command>", " to set a command that will be executed after you enter a pool.") end end
function set_entry_command(name, line, wildcards) entry_command = wildcards.command if entry_command == "clear" then entry_command = nil InfoNote("Entry command cleared. Use ", "pw entry <command>", " to set a command that will be executed after you enter a pool.") DeleteVariable("entry_command") else InfoNote("Entry command set to ", entry_command, ". This will be executed every time you use PlanesWalker to enter a uplane/lplanes pool. You can clear it with ", "pw entry clear", ".") SetVariable("entry_command", entry_command) end SaveState() end
function upcase_first_char(str) return str:sub(1,1):upper() .. str:sub(2) end
function show_help() print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", string.rep("=", 80)) ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "PlanesWalker:", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", " A mod for helping to find mobs in upper and lower planes.") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", "With Crowley's Search and Destroy v5.81 and later, it will automatically detect") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", "when you have targeted a mob in the upper or lower planes.") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", "Commands:") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "pw", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", " When you have a target in the planes it will show the table with its\n location again.") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "pw <num>", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", " When you have a target, it will take you the pool on that line of the\n table.") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "pw <mob name>", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", " Searches for the given mob in the upper and lower planes,\n displaying their pool location if found.") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "pw pool <1-14>", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", " Runs to and enter the pool with the given number.") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "pw entry <command>", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", " Sets a command that is executed automatically when you enter\n a pool.") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "pw entry", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", " Check the command to be executed when you enter a pool.") print("") print("") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, "", "NOTE:", LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", " For this to work correctly you need an amulet of the planes registered in\nyour mapper portals.") ColourNote(LOG_COLORS.INFO, "", string.rep("=", 80)) print("") end
-- Logging LOG_COLORS = { INFO = "#B274EC", INFO_HIGHLIGHT = "#7EFF38",
IMPORTANT = "#FFFFFF", IMPORTANT_HIGHLIGHT = "#7EFF38", IMPORTANT_BACKGROUND = "#471278",
DEBUG = "#87CEFA", DEBUG_HIGHLIGHT = "#FFD700", }
function InfoNote(...) log_with_alternating_note({"PlanesWalker: ", ...}, LOG_COLORS.INFO_HIGHLIGHT, LOG_COLORS.INFO) end
function ImportantNote(...) log_with_alternating_note({"PlanesWalker: ", ...}, LOG_COLORS.IMPORTANT_HIGHLIGHT, LOG_COLORS.IMPORTANT, LOG_COLORS.IMPORTANT_BACKGROUND) end
function DebugNote(...) if debug_mode then log_with_alternating_note({"PlanesWalker DEBUG: ", ...}, LOG_COLORS.DEBUG_HIGHLIGHT, LOG_COLORS.DEBUG) end end
function log_with_alternating_note(messages, color1, color2, background) background = background or ""
for i, message in ipairs(messages) do ColourTell(color1, background, message) color1, color2 = color2, color1 end print("\n") end
function reload() Execute(GetAlphaOption("script_prefix") .. "DoAfterSpecial(1, \"ReloadPlugin('" .. GetPluginID() .. "')\", sendto.script)") end
function toggle_debug() if debug_mode then DebugNote("Debug mode ", "disabled\n") debug_mode = false else debug_mode = true DebugNote("Debug mode ", "enabled\n") end SetVariable("debug_mode", tostring(debug_mode)) SaveState() end
muclient.aliases:
<alias match="^pw pool (?\d+)$" script="enter_pool_alias" enabled="y" regexp="y" sequence="100" ignore_case="y" send_to="12" />
<alias match="^pw (?\d+)$" script="choose_pool_option" enabled="y" regexp="y" sequence="200" ignore_case="y" send_to="12" />
<alias match="^pw (?.*)$" script="mob_search" enabled="y" regexp="y" sequence="201" ignore_case="y" send_to="12" />
<alias match="^pw entry (?.+)$" script="set_entry_command" enabled="y" regexp="y" sequence="100" ignore_case="y" send_to="12" />
